data.pricing_trends: Prices vary by season, generally higher in peak months (December and January) and lower in the off-peak season.
data.booking_windows: Best to book 2-3 months in advance for optimal prices, with last-minute deals occasionally available.
data.demand: Demand is particularly high during holiday seasons, with travelers showing interest in cultural experiences and natural wonders.
data.competition: Key competitors include Costa Rica and Mexico for eco-tourism and cultural experiences.
